dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text:
In this fictional universe, you play as a sentient robot who has to navigate through various alien habitats on remote planets in search of parts to repair your ship. There are many alien machines and creatures who block your way, and some are very hostile.  Your only options are to run, fight, or lockdown the ship to avoid damage.

Gameplay consists of navigating through the alien habitat levels, while collecting parts for your ship, and repairing it.

dialogues.speaker: Computer
dialogues.text: The game is very difficult and often seems unfair, and no strategy seems to work for very long.
